snippet: After a painstaking restoration, five of the famed Caryatid statues of ancient Greece are star attractions at the Acropolis Museum in Athens.
abstract: Five of the famed Caryatid statues of ancient Greece, which underwent painstaking three- and-a-half year restoration, are star attractions at Acropolis Museum in Athens; sixth Caryatid is installed at British Museum in London, which acquired it nearly a century ago.
lead_paragraph: After a painstaking restoration, five of the famed Caryatid statues of ancient Greece are star attractions at the Acropolis Museum in Athens.

headline.seo: Caryatid Statues, Restored, Are Stars at Athens Museum
